taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family papaveraceae; genus Papaver; section Papaver;

bio:treatment.description: Plants annual, caulescent. Leaf blades unlobed or 1Ã—-lobed, distal clasping stem. Flowers: filaments white, clavate. Capsules poricidal, glabrous.

references.reference: Kadereit, J. W. 1986b. A revision of Papaver L. sect. Papaver (Papaveraceae). Bot. Jahrb. Syst. 108: 1-16.
